definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: mock, scoff (Sir 11:4 [[תקלס]], text by Adler:JQ xii (1900), 470);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לְקַלֵּס]] [[אָתְנׇן]] Ez Eze 16:31 to scoff at hire (of Jerusalem under fig. of harlot), but LXX SyrVer Symm collect, rd. [[לִקְבּׂץ]] Gr Toy Krae (or [[לְלַקֵּט]], Co).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: mock, deride, c. [[ב]] pers., Impf. 3 ms. [[יִתְקַלָָּס]] Hb Hab 1:10; 3 mpl. [[יִתְקַלְּסוּ]] Ez Eze 22:5, ´[[וַיִּת]]: 2Ki 2:23.
